scripts.say: I can't believe it, there really is an Iron Blood fleet out here... I hate admitting it, but it seems you were right. We should hurry to the Río de la Plata Estuary and sort them out.
Sorry, girls, but I can't let you pass.
Ahahah... you must be a Z-class, no?
That's right. You're talking to none other than the 1st ship of the Z-class - Leberecht Maass!
It must be tough to have so many sisters.
Tough? Uh, not really. I'm honestly blessed to have so many cute little sisters.
I see. You're a nice big sister to them, just like our sister Leander is to us.
Shouldn't Graf Spee be arriving at the Río de la Plata Estuary any time now?
Yep. ...Wait, you tryin' to make me look dumb?!
Whatever. At any rate, I'm not letting you through!
Ahahah, I must've struck a nerve... Now you're worth toying with... Let's go, Exeter!
Roger! But strangely enough now I can sympathize with Z1...
